LightningComponentBundle.description: A modern, SLDS 2 compliant account card for Revenue Cloud demos with real-time metrics from Quotes, Orders, Assets, and Invoices

property.name: headerBackgroundUrl
property.label: Header Background URL
property.description: URL for the header background image (leave empty for gradient)

property.name: logoUrl
property.label: Account Logo URL (Fallback)
property.description: Fallback URL if Account.AccountCardLogo__c is empty

property.name: fallbackLogoUrl
property.label: Default Logo URL
property.description: Default logo URL if no other source is available

property.name: showQuoteCount
property.label: Show Quote Count
property.description: Display number of quotes for this account

property.name: showQuoteTotal
property.label: Show Quote Total
property.description: Display total value of all quotes

property.name: showAssetCount
property.label: Show Asset Count
property.description: Display number of assets for this account

property.name: showOrderTotal
property.label: Show Order Total
property.description: Display total value of all orders

property.name: showInvoiceTotal
property.label: Show Invoice Total
property.description: Display total value of all invoices

property.name: quoteCountFallback
property.label: Quote Count Fallback
property.description: Fallback value if no quote data (e.g., '5')

property.name: quoteTotalFallback
property.label: Quote Total Fallback
property.description: Fallback value if no quote total (e.g., '$125,000')

property.name: assetCountFallback
property.label: Asset Count Fallback
property.description: Fallback value if no asset data (e.g., '12')

property.name: orderTotalFallback
property.label: Order Total Fallback
property.description: Fallback value if no order data (e.g., '$500,000')

property.name: invoiceTotalFallback
property.label: Invoice Total Fallback
property.description: Fallback value if no invoice data (e.g., '$450,000')

property.name: showBrandAffinities
property.label: Show Brand Affinities
property.description: Show/hide the sub-brands section (reads from Account.Brand_1_Name__c through Brand_4_Name__c and Brand_1_Image__c through Brand_4_Image__c fields, falls back to settings below)

property.name: brandAffinitiesTitle
property.label: Brand Section Title
property.description: Title for the brand affinities section
